welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Bicas, Brazil! Known for its charming streets, rich culture, and delicious cuisine, we invite you to soak up all that our wonderful city has to offer and create unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reg. da Zona da Mata Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Reg. da Zona da Mata Airport, handling all air freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a fee.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Francisco De Assis Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
